title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 27, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 27, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### (requires Neovim 0.5) / Diagnostics

*   [piersolenski/wtf.nvim (⭐455)](https://github.com/piersolenski/wtf.nvim) - AI powered diagnostic debugging, helps explain complex errors and offers custom tailored solutions.

### Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

*   [Verf/deepwhite.nvim (⭐133)](https://github.com/Verf/deepwhite.nvim) - A light colorscheme inspired by [flatwhite-syntax (⭐180)](https://github.com/biletskyy/flatwhite-syntax) and [elegant-emacs (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/rougier/elegant-emacs).

### Utility / Diagnostics

*   [GCBallesteros/NotebookNavigator.nvim (⭐230)](https://github.com/GCBallesteros/NotebookNavigator.nvim) - Navigate and execute code cells.

### Formatting / Diagnostics

*   [stevearc/conform.nvim (⭐4.3k)](https://github.com/stevearc/conform.nvim) - A lightweight formatting engine that plays nice with LSP.
items.content_html:
(requires Neovim 0.5) / Diagnostics

  • piersolenski/wtf.nvim (⭐455) - AI powered diagnostic debugging, helps explain complex errors and offers custom tailored solutions.

Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

  • Verf/deepwhite.nvim (⭐133) - A light colorscheme inspired by flatwhite-syntax (⭐180) and elegant-emacs (⭐1.4k).

Utility / Diagnostics

  • GCBallesteros/NotebookNavigator.nvim (⭐230) - Navigate and execute code cells.

Formatting / Diagnostics

  • stevearc/conform.nvim (⭐4.3k) - A lightweight formatting engine that plays nice with LSP.

items.title: Awesome Crystal
items.content_text:
### C bindings

*   [win32cr (⭐18)](https://github.com/mjblack/win32cr) - Bindings for Win32 API

### HTML Builders

*   [to\_html (⭐9)](https://github.com/sbsoftware/to_html.cr) - The fastest HTML builder engine for Crystal
items.content_html:
C bindings

  • win32cr (⭐18) - Bindings for Win32 API

HTML Builders
